title: Pixel 5: Live transcribe not working with internal mic
content:
I am trying to use Live Transcribe with my Pixel 5. When I pair the phone with an external bluetooth audio device it works perfectly, however when I switch to the Device Mic (or disconnect from the bluetooth device) it doesn't seem to be getting any audio at all.

I have updated to the latest version and reverted to the original pre-installed version - to no avail.

Would appreciate some advice on how to get this working with the internal mic.

Thanks in advance.
